original_text: The Levites took down the ark of the Lord, together with the chest containing the gold objects, and placed them on the large rock. On that day the people of Beth Shemesh offered burnt offerings and made sacrifices to the Lord.
korean_text: 레위인은 여호와의 궤와 그 궤와 함께 있는 금 보물 담긴 상자를 내려다가 큰 돌 위에 두매 그 날에 벧세메스 사람들이 여호와께 번제와 다른 제사를 드리니라

sentences.original_text: The Levites took down the ark of the Lord
together with the chest containing the gold objects
and placed them on the large rock
the people of Beth Shemesh offered burnt offerings
and made sacrifices to the Lord
